memberdef.argsstring: (ControlType type, SceneRPtr scene, castor::String const &name, ControlStyleRPtr controlStyle, ScrollableStyleRPtr scrollableStyle, ControlRPtr parent, castor::Position const &position, castor::Size const &size, ControlFlagType flags=0, bool visible=true)
memberdef.name: LayoutControl

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor.
scene
The parent scene (nullptr for global).
name
The control name.
type
The type.
controlStyle
The control's style.
scrollableStyle
The scrollable's style.
parent
The parent control, if any.
position
The position.
size
The size.
flags
The configuration flags
visible
Initial visibility status.
